user.title: Add ESP32 Bulb Relay
user.description: Enter the IP address of your ESP32 Bulb Relay device (e.g., 192.168.1.100). The device must be connected to your network and accessible.

select_bulbs.title: Select Bulbs
select_bulbs.description: Select which bulbs you want to add to Home Assistant. You can change this later in the integration settings.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to ESP32. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is online.
error.no_bulbs: No bulbs found on this ESP32. Please ensure bulbs are connected.
error.no_bulbs_selected: Please select at least one bulb to add.

init.title: ESP32 Bulb Relay Settings
init.description: Configure your ESP32 Bulb Relay integration.

manage_bulbs.title: Manage Bulbs
manage_bulbs.description: Select which bulbs should be enabled in Home Assistant. Configured hosts: {hosts}

add_esp32.title: Add ESP32
add_esp32.description: Add another ESP32 Bulb Relay device to this integration.

select_new_bulbs.title: Select Bulbs from {host}
select_new_bulbs.description: Found {count} bulb(s) on this ESP32. Select which ones to add.

remove_esp32.title: Remove ESP32
remove_esp32.description: Select an ESP32 to remove from this integration. This will remove all bulbs associated with it.

debug_commands.title: Debug Commands
debug_commands.description: These commands are for debugging purposes only. Use with caution.

debug_connect.title: Connect Bulb
debug_connect.description: Manually connect/reconnect a bulb. This is a debug command.

debug_disconnect.title: Disconnect Bulb
debug_disconnect.description: Manually disconnect a bulb. This is a debug command. WARNING: The bulb will not respond until reconnected.

error.no_bulbs: No bulbs found on this ESP32.
error.command_failed: The command failed. Please check the connection.

abort.cannot_remove_last: Cannot remove the last ESP32. Delete the integration instead.

bulb_name.name: Bulb Name
bulb_name.description: Name of the bulb to connect.

bulb_name.name: Bulb Name
bulb_name.description: Name of the bulb to disconnect.

refresh_bulbs.name: Refresh Bulbs
refresh_bulbs.description: Force refresh the status of all bulbs.
